alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 10:54AM MDT until June 23 at 12:08AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek At Pueblo affecting Pueblo County. For the Fountain Creek...including Pueblo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek At Pueblo. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor lowland agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM MDT Thursday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.5 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM MDT.
